channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- One Click Plugin Updater
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- One Click Plugin Updater

item.title: CVE-2022-1791|2024-08-03T00:17:00.794Z -- unknown -- one%20click%20plugin%20updater
item.description: The One Click Plugin Updater WordPress plugin through 2.4.14 does not have CSRF check in place when updating its settings, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin change them via a CSRF attack and disable / hide the badge of the available updates and the related check.
